item.title: 10 Steps to free blogging with Hugo and GitHub Pages
item.description: 10 Steps to free blogging with Hugo and GitHub Pages Blog like a developer: with Hugo and Markdown via your GitHub repository in 10 easy steps. This is a quick guide to your own static blog hosted on GitHub Pages and served on your own domain. Hugo This quick start guide is based on Hugo, check their documentation for more configuration options and troubleshooting. 1. Install Hugo brew install hugo # or port install hugo 2.
